Dear Swarovski,

 

This is a follow-up regarding the subjected pending documents for submission or those that may have expired. As mentioned previously and as specified in your lease agreement (CLAUSE 4 and 6), it is your responsibility to keep Mall Management updated with all mandatory compliance documents validated upon its renewals, including the Trade license, Ejari, Annual Maintenance Contracts, DCD certificates and Insurance documents (PAR,PL & WC). Note: This email is system generated. Please submit all the necessary documents to ayah.qasem@dham.ae <mailto:ayah.qasem@dham.ae>  at your earliest convenience.
Best Regards,


--------------------------------------------------
